fields._description_rendered: Open Learning Exchange is committed to removing the barriers to learning so that all of our children enjoy learning that is open, free and meaningful, enabling them to become, in their own ways, productive, life-long learners and leaders which is a requirement for a sustainable world. The Foundation for Learning Equality is collaborating with OLE on ways to help make this shared vision a reality.
fields.name: Open Learning Exchange
fields.description: Open Learning Exchange is committed to removing the barriers to learning so that all of our children enjoy learning that is open, free and meaningful, enabling them to become, in their own ways, productive, life-long learners and leaders which is a requirement for a sustainable world. The Foundation for Learning Equality is collaborating with OLE on ways to help make this shared vision a reality.

fields._description_rendered: Khan Academy is a not-for-profit with the goal of changing education for the better by providing a free world-class education for anyone anywhere. The Foundation for Learning Equality is partnering with Khan Academy to play a key role in achieving this mission, by bridging the gap to offline and low-bandwidth communities using KA Lite.
fields.name: Khan Academy
fields.description: Khan Academy is a not-for-profit with the goal of changing education for the better by providing a free world-class education for anyone anywhere. The Foundation for Learning Equality is partnering with Khan Academy to play a key role in achieving this mission, by bridging the gap to offline and low-bandwidth communities using KA Lite.

fields._description_rendered: Idaho Department of Corrections (IDOC) is part of the Khan in Idaho program, the FLE has partnered with the NNU Center of Innovation in Teaching and the CCA to bring KA Lite to inmates across 7 facilities of the Idaho Department of Corrections. This year-long study will examine the efficacy of Khan Academy content, and we hope it might serve as a launching pad to bring KA Lite to prisons across the nation.
fields.name: Idaho Department of Corrections
fields.description: Idaho Department of Corrections (IDOC) is part of the Khan in Idaho program, the FLE has partnered with the NNU Center of Innovation in Teaching and the CCA to bring KA Lite to inmates across 7 facilities of the Idaho Department of Corrections. fields._description_rendered: The The Akanksha Foundation is a non-profit organization with the vision to one day equip all students with the education, skills and character they need to lead empowered lives. We are piloting KA Lite in several Akanksha classrooms, with funding for the hardware provided by an Indian family foundation.
fields.name: The Akanksha Foundation
fields.description: The The Akanksha Foundation is a non-profit organization with the vision to one day equip all students with the education, skills and character they need to lead empowered lives. We are piloting KA Lite in several Akanksha classrooms, with funding for the hardware provided by an Indian family foundation.

fields._description_rendered: The Hewlett Foundation, with assets of more than $7 billion, has ambitious goals that include: helping to reduce global poverty, limiting the risk of climate change, improving education for students in California and elsewhere, improving reproductive health and rights worldwide, supporting vibrant performing arts in our community, advancing the field of philanthropy, and supporting disadvantaged communities in the San Francisco Bay Area.
fields.name: The Hewlett Foundation
fields.description: The Hewlett Foundation, with assets of more than $7 billion, has ambitious goals that include: helping to reduce global poverty, limiting the risk of climate change, improving education for students in California and elsewhere, improving reproductive health and rights worldwide, supporting vibrant performing arts in our community, advancing the field of philanthropy, and supporting disadvantaged communities in the San Francisco Bay Area.

fields._description_rendered: Qatar Foundation International (QFI) is dedicated to connecting cultures and advancing global citizenship through education. QFI is a not-for-profit organization in Washington, D.C., focused on grant-giving and programmatic activities that promote education as a force that facilitates collaboration across geographical, social and cultural boundaries.
fields.name: Qatar Foundation International
fields.description: Qatar Foundation International (QFI) is dedicated to connecting cultures and advancing global citizenship through education. QFI is a not-for-profit organization in Washington, D.C., focused on grant-giving and programmatic activities that promote education as a force that facilitates collaboration across geographical, social and cultural boundaries.

fields._description_rendered: Rackspace is the global leader in hybrid cloud and founder of OpenStack®, the open-source operating system for the cloud. Hundreds of thousands of customers look to Rackspace to deliver the best-fit infrastructure for their IT needs, leveraging a product portfolio that allows workloads to run where they perform best—whether on the public cloud, private cloud, dedicated servers, or a combination of platforms.
fields.name: Rackspace Hosting
fields.description: Rackspace is the global leader in hybrid cloud and founder of OpenStack®, the open-source operating system for the cloud. Hundreds of thousands of customers look to Rackspace to deliver the best-fit infrastructure for their IT needs, leveraging a product portfolio that allows workloads to run where they perform best—whether on the public cloud, private cloud, dedicated servers, or a combination of platforms.

fields._description_rendered: The University of California at San Diego (UCSD) is a public research university dedicated to the advancement of knowledge through excellence in education and research at the undergraduate, graduate, professional school and postdoctoral levels. The campus is committed to community engagement, public service and industry partnerships in order to advance the health and well-being of our region, state, nation and the world.
